price: Dan Ibrāhīm berkata, "Sesungguhnya aku pergi menghadap kepada Tuhan-ku dan Dia akan memberi petunjuk kepadaku 1283.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
footnotes: 1283.  Maksudnya, Ibrāhīm ‘Alaihissalām pergi ke suatu negeri untuk dapat menyembah Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā dan berdakwah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
